contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Radio station | name = XHRV | image = | city = [[Valle Hermoso, Tamaulipas]] | area = [[Brownsville, Texas]], [[USA]]/Matamoros, [[Mexico]] | branding = Exa FM | slogan = Sobre Todas Las Cosas Â¡Ponte Exa! | airdate = | frequency = 89.5 [[Megahertz|MHz]] | format = [[Contemporary hit radio|Spanish & English Top 40 (CHR)]] | power = | erp = 100,000 [[watt]]s | haat = 87.5 meters | class = C | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = XHNVA-FM | owner = [http://www.libertas.mx/ Radio Libertas] | webcast = | website = [http://www.exafm.com/matamoros/ www.exafm.com/matamoros] | affiliations = [[MVS Radio]] }} '''XHRV''' (branded as Exa FM) is a [[Contemporary hit radio|Spanish & English Top 40 (CHR)]] [[radio station]] that serves the Valle Hermoso and Matamoros border area. ==External links== *[http://www.exafm.com.mx/ Official website] *[http://www.exafm.com/matamoros/ Exa FM 89.5 official website] *[http://www.mexicoradiotv.com/tamaulipas/index.htm mexicoradiotv.com; List of Tamaulipas radio stations] *[http://radiostationworld.com/Locations/United_States_of_America/Texas/radio.asp?m=rio raiostationworld.com; Radio stations in the Rio Grande Valley] <br clear=all> {{Heroica Matamoros Radio}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Matamoros]] {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}}
